did.abstract: The 115th Street Branch of The New York Public Library was opened in 1908. The library building was designed by the architectural firm of McKim, Mead & White and was constructed with funds provided by Andrew Carnegie. Publicity materials and administrative files documenting the operations of the 115th Street Branch of The New York Public Library.

bioghist.p: The 115th Street Branch of The New York Public Library was opened in 1908. The library building was designed by the architectural firm of McKim, Mead & White and was constructed with funds provided by Andrew Carnegie.

scopecontent.p: Publicity materials and administrative files documenting the operations of the 115th Street Branch of The New York Public Library.

prefercite.p: 115th Street Branch Records, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library.

processinfo.p: Compiled Jim Moske; machine readable finding aid created by FAKER.
